messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Speed Of Dark
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Marjorie ~ Isn t life strange?  I will buy the book, as my youngest son is Autistic.....I cannot imagine a read, the way he thinks.....lol. I decided to
messages.messageBody:
Hi Marjorie ~
Isn't life strange? I will buy the book, as my youngest son is
Autistic.....I cannot imagine a read, the way he thinks.....lol. I decided to homeschool,
partly because of the torture school put him thru, he was so angry, not that I
let him BE...it's amazing how quickly he is learning and picking up new words,
etc. Even if some of them are cuss words, we can't help but
smile.........they are WORDS! I bought a leap pad for him, and since it incorporates all the
senses (except smell) he absolutely loves it, and I am quietly sitting by,
okay I'm lurking.....as he shows me he knows way more than I ever dreamed he did.
I will find the book this weekend.
Thanks!
Michelle


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
